attributes.action: Hold illegals custody until they can prove why there are in the country.
attributes.additional_details: The issue of illegal immigrants has gone on for way too long and we need to stop this from happening in our own country and we must take action immediately.
attributes.background: This should allow then government to check every illegal immigrant on why they are coming into the country and if they can’t give a valid reason to send them back

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/736531
